What is an image?

03 Apr 2017


Download slides

Images are matrices

Image types

JPEG

  • lossy compression
  • loss of informations
  • light
  • DO NOT USE
  • Minervini, M. et al. (2015) The significance of image compression in plant phenotyping applications. Funct. Plant Biol.

TIFF

  • no compression
  • NO loss of informations
  • heavy

PNG

  • lossless compression
  • NO loss of informations
  • light
